> 
>> For generic(?) vi's .exrc:

>> set tabstop=8
>> set shiftwidth=8
> 
>> For VIM's .vimrc:
> ...

If there is no other discussion, then I'm checking this into
SAMBA_3_0*.  So this will officially institute the 80 col rule :-)





cheers, jerry
